ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Research_Partnership", ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Executed"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Pure_Project_ID__r.Pure_CLMS_Contract_Status__c , "Internally Approved")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Pure_Project_ID__r.Pure_CLMS_Contract_Status__c ,'')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Contract status must be Internally Approved
